Articles.Content:
Yo there fellow kerbalnauts!

I'm unable to add avatar or profile picture. Can't locate option for that in the profile settings.

Is it disabled for new members until admin has reviewed my account or something?

and I tried search.. no luck.
After you get 5 posts, the forum believes you're a real person, not a bot... You won't have to wait for post moderation, and can then edit your profile/avatar/sig/etc.

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
cheers for the info
Ok, thanks for the info!
Ahh excellent. i wondered if that was the case.
Welcome! I'm curious to what you KSP records are.

Welcome! I'm curious to what you KSP records are.

...well... some explosions and random structural failures

Then I built some more rockets and learned how to get to the orbit properly. (Thanks to Scott Manley for some good tutorials on youtube)

Crashed on the MÃƒÂ¼n.

Orbited the MÃƒÂ¼n

Landed on the MÃƒÂ¼n.

Flew a rocket to the sun (what a dissapointment, it just went poof gone. Hoping for some overheat effects to be added by the devs in the future).

Learned to dock in space.

Flew a satellite to orbit the moon of the purple planet. Can't recall the name now though.

Started to make an interplanetary modular space station, but had trouble aligning the docking ports so the station ended up docking the parts in few degrees off. I tried maybe 3 to 4 designs and then I got bored of launching an docking for a while.

During the station assembly I started using mechjeb to launch in to orbit.

I now know there is an addon to rotate the docked ports, so I will be continuing the project later.

After I got bored of the station building, I started to play around making aeroplanes.

And made a Jeep. With a winch.

Edited July 31, 2013 by marqush
Thank for the info, was starting to think id missed something :-)

Aaah, thanks!

After you get 5 posts, the forum believes you're a real person, not a bot... You won't have to wait for post moderation, and can then edit your profile/avatar/sig/etc.

Hi! Welcome to the forums!

Nice achievements too! And the moon of the purple planet(Eve) is called Gilly.

I was confused as you too when I first registered.
Thanks! I worked on a picture I am really eager to use as my avatar
So is it just myself making 5 posts? Or 5 other posts on something I create? I'm pretty sure it's the first one, but just wanted to make sure
Hit the submit button on 5 posts, and you're set, though there can be a little delay while the software makes the change. Which doesn't matter now, since I see you're at 8, but there you go.
good, cause I thought it was like a bug or something
Thanks for the info
No wonder. I was starting to think I was being blocked or something.
That's very helpful because I just kept on clicking random areas where it said to edit my avatar.
wait, does that mean 5 of your posts, or five posts on threads you've made ???
Welcome aboard, CucumberMoose. It's five posts anywhere, any thread.
Wait, you mean, even things you post in 2-year-old threads like this one count?!
